```{python}
import pandas as pd

skills_data = {
    "Name": ["Bingrui Qiao", "Zhengyu Zhou", "Junhao Wang"],
    "Python": [2, 2, 3],
    "SQL": [2, 2, 3],
    "Machine Learning": [1, 1, 1],
    "Cloud Computing": [2, 2, 3]
}

df_skills = pd.DataFrame(skills_data)
df_skills.set_index("Name", inplace=True)
df_skills
```
```{python}
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

plt.figure(figsize=(8, 6))
sns.heatmap(df_skills, annot=True, cmap="coolwarm", linewidths=0.5)
plt.title("Team Skill Levels Heatmap")


plt.savefig("figures/Skill_Gap_Analysis.png", dpi=300, bbox_inches="tight")
plt.show()

```
